Historic Charleston

The Top Ranked Historic Hotel in Charleston

Planters Inn offers elegant accommodations with the very best location of all Charleston hotels.

PREMIER LOCATION

Explore Charleston

Planters Inn is situated in the very heart and soul of Charleston’s famed Historic District. The hotel overlooks the Charleston City Market and is ideally located for exploring the city on foot.

Discover
the charms of charleston 
TOP RANKED U.S. HOTEL

Award-Winning Charleston Hotel

Planters Inn Charleston is the winner of Travel + Leisure magazine's #1 Best Boutique Hotel in the United States Award and also recognized on Conde Nast Traveler magazine's Top 100 Hotels List.

DISCOVER
Planters Inn's awards 
ONE-OF-A-KIND ACCOMMODATIONS

Four Star Historic Hotel

Built in 1844 as a luxury goods emporium, Planters Inn in an artfully preserved architectural treasure and one of the most unique boutique hotels in America. In a city that emanates stately Georgian Era elegance, the AAA Four-Diamond Planters Inn is no exception.

Discover
our unique history 
ART DE VIVRE

Relais & Châteaux Designation

Planters Inn and Peninsula Grill are longstanding members of Relais & Châteaux, the exclusive collection of luxury boutique hotels and gourmet restaurants located in the world's most romantic destinations.

Discover
the world of Relais & Chateaux 
"When you walk around Planters Inn, you’ll find subdued old Southern elegance, including a leafy interior courtyard and a parlor with patterned armchairs and gold chandeliers." - Forbes

VENUE SPOTLIGHT

The Planters Inn Courtyard

Planters Inn is the only historic hotel in Downtown Charleston with a garden courtyard venue available for hosting private events.

Charleston is referred to as “a city set in a garden,” and preeminent landscape designer Sheila Wertimer is well known for returning historic gardens to their nineteenth-century glory. For the Planters Inn Courtyard, Wertimer created a bluestone terrace that beguiles in both scale and style.

Perfectly manicured ornamental boxwoods are framed by historic brick pathways frame, while crepe myrtle and palmetto trees, wrought iron gates, and Charleston Battery benches enliven the venue with distinctively Southern character.

Every evening at dusk, the carriage lanterns are lit by hand—one-by-one—until the Planters Inn Courtyard comes alive. Trees are illuminated, candles glow, and tea lights flicker in a magical twilight tableau.

The Planters Inn Courtyard was intentionally designed to accommodate a variety of occasions—from intimate suppers to lively cocktail soirees. A gathering that begins outdoors can easily transition mid-event into either of Planters Inn’s two private dining rooms, both of which overlook the Courtyard.

Regarded as one of the most enchanting places to socialize in the South, the Planters Inn Courtyard’s resplendent sense of arrival and ambiance will set the stage for your unforgettable event.

VENUE SPOTLIGHT

The Planters Inn Garden Room

Our Signature Event Venue: 
A Classic Charleston Setting for Your Event.

The Garden Room is an elegant 1,400-square-foot venue beautifully appointed with antique mirrors, historic reproduction sideboards, plush fabric panels, and a bank of windows overlooking the Planters Inn Courtyard.

The Garden Room accommodates up to 120 guests for a cocktail reception and up to 80 guests for a seated luncheon or dinner.

VENUE SPOTLIGHT

The Charleston Room

An Aesthetically Stunning Yet Unpretentious Dining Room

Planters Inn is the only historic hotel in Downtown Charleston with a garden courtyard venue available for hosting private events.

is an exquisite 450-square-foot venue with tasteful decor that opens onto the Planters Inn Courtyard. The Charleston Room accommodates up to 50 guests for cocktail receptions and up to 32 guests for a seated luncheon or dinner.
The Charleston Room Scroll to Top

PRIVATE DINNERS IN CHARLESTON

Private Dining and Events at Peninsula Grill in Charleston

"At Peninsula Grill, you get the feeling that this is dinner how it's supposed to be done: a special spot for a special evening of elegant food and drink." — Conde Nast Traveler

Imagine... A hidden courtyard illuminated by flickering carriage lanterns and tea lights dancing in the trees. This is the enchanting entrance to your event.

Imagine... Sophisticated interpretations of Southern flavors made with the finest and freshest ingredients sourced daily. This is the cuisine served at your event.

Imagine... A professional staff working tirelessly behind-the-scenes to ensure your event is flawless. This is the Relais & Châteaux caliber of service both you and your guests will experience.

Planters Inn & Peninsula Grill private events are available seven days a week. In addition to dinner, Peninsula Grill private dining is available for brunch and daytime events. For ten to 120 guests.
Private Events Gallery Online Look Book 
"Indulge in a multi-course dinner of seared foie gras, jumbo blue crab salad, and pan-seared snapper at the upscale ... be sure to save room for dessert. 'The Peninsula Grill is just the best,' added one fan. 'My wife can’t stop talking about the coconut cake!'" — Travel + Leisure World's Best Awards

[Page Title: Luxury Hotel in Charleston SC | Planters Inn French Quarter]

Arrival ) Departure Adults Children Book Now Open Modal Button × Close Modal 
Enjoy 18% Off and a Welcome Drink at Benne's

This winter, let the cozy magic of Charleston wrap you in its seasonal glow. Our Warming Up to Charleston offer invites you to enjoy 18% off your room rate and a welcome drink at Benne’s, our cafe and bar, where Southern hospitality meets fire-side comfort.
BOOK NOW 
The Grande Dame  Boutique Hotels in Charleston's Historic French Quarter
of 
When Planters Inn first opened its doors in 1844, it claimed one of  — the iconic corner of Market and Meeting Streets. Today, this historic luxury hotel continues to preside over the very heart of downtown Charleston, South Carolina, offering guests  steps from the City Market and King Street.

As , Planters Inn is an intimate sanctuary for travelers who appreciate timeless elegance, personal service, and a sense of place. Behind our stately façade, guests discover gracious interiors, residential-style suites, and a hidden garden courtyard that feels worlds away from the bustle outside.
the most coveted locations among Charleston Hotels refined accommodations South Carolina’s only Relais & Châteaux hotel 
TRAVEL + LEISURE MAGAZINE'S #1 BEST U.S. BOUTIQUE HOTEL AWARD-WINNER

"Staying at Planters Inn is akin 
to an overnight with well-to-do friends 
in their old Charleston mansion." 
—magazine
Travel + Leisure 
★ ★ ★ ★ ★

Refined Style & Historic Character

Every detail of our luxury boutique hotel reflects Charleston’s storied past and gracious hospitality.  feature four-poster beds from Baker’s Historic Charleston Collection, silk drapery, fireplaces, private piazzas, and curated antiques — all opening onto a serene, hidden garden courtyard. Planters Inn blends historic architecture with modern comfort, creating a setting that feels both elegant and inviting.
Guest rooms and suites 
STAY IN STYLE

Spacious Hotel Suites in Charleston, SC

Planters Inn has some of the largest hotel suites in downtown Charleston. Every element has been thoughtfully considered to create a comfortable, residential-style living space equally suited to business and leisure travel--from oversized closets to accommodate your travel wardrobe to king-size four-poster beds for a wonderful night of sleep.
SPACIOUS HOTEL SUITES 
"Stepping into Planters Inn is like stumbling
upon your own secret oasis. The elegant
lobby is a precursor to the tranquility
of the garden courtyard."
—
Atlanta Magazine 
★ ★ ★ ★ ★

Enchanted Evenings

Acclaimed Dining at Peninsula Grill

Beyond the garden path illuminated by lantern light lies Peninsula Grill,  and a destination in its own right. Consistently ranked among the city’s finest dining experiences, Peninsula Grill is renowned for its elegant atmosphere, exceptional service, and iconic cuisine — including the world-famous Ultimate Coconut Cake®.
Charleston’s most romantic restaurant PENINSULA GRILL 
"Peninsula Grill epitomizes fine dining. 
The velvet-lined walls and antebellum 
portraits set a cultivated mood 
and the food is sublime."
—
Conde Nast Traveler 
★ ★ ★ ★ ★

See & Be Seen

Want to see photos of our hotel in Charleston? Our image gallery highlights the Lowcountry traditions that permeate our historic hotel, including sweetgrass baskets, four poster beds, Audubon prints, carriage lanterns, and more!

THINGS TO DO & SEE

Experience the Best Place to Stay in Charleston

With a premier location in the Charleston Historic District, . Planters Inn overlooks the Charleston City Market and King Street is one block away.
Planters Inn places guests within walking distance of the city’s most celebrated attractions 
Ask the concierge for a map of Charleston. You will see that the most scenic neighborhoods, the most popular attractions, and the best things to do are within walking distance of the hotel.

ART DE VIVRE

A Relais & Châteaux Hotel in Charleston, SC

Planters Inn is proud to be the only , part of an exclusive global collection of privately owned landmark hotels and restaurants. This distinction places Planters Inn among celebrated properties such as The Inn at Little Washington, The French Laundry, Ocean House, and Blackberry Farm — united by a shared philosophy of art de vivre, exceptional hospitality, and unforgettable experiences.
